title: $100 Finder Fee offered for the following Seymour Throwing Backs
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: $100 Finder Fee offered for the following Seymour Throwing Backs
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone.. been stuck on my search for Seymour Throwing backs.. I am happy to offer $100 to anyone that can point me in the direction of an owner of any of the following cards.. and it leads to a sale.

T206 Seymour Throwing Drum Back
T206 Seymour Throwing Lenox Back
T206 Seymour Throwing Broad Leaf Back
T206 Seymour Throwing Red Hindu Back
T206 Seymour Throwing Blank Back

If I am able to buy all 5 from you pointing me in the direction.. thats the easiest $500 you've ever made.

[url]Blunder19@aol.com[/url]
Jamie
